Lambda Chops

Fizzbuzz Code Challenge

Tags: Python 03 Jul 2019 
def fizzbuzz():

	mylist = []
	  
	  for num in range(1,101):
	    if num % 3 == 0 and num % 5 == 0:
	      mylist.append('fizzbuzz')
	    elif num % 3 == 0:
	      mylist.append('fizz')
	    elif num % 5 == 0:
	      mylist.append('buzz')
	    else:
	      mylist.append(num)
	      
	  return mylist
